The Blue Ribbon Project

Talk is cheap. The blue ribbon project is dedicated to holding our institutions accountable: to deconstructing their aims, gauging their feasibility, and describing what steps, in practice, need to be taken for them to be actualised, for their ambitions to receive an elusive blue ribbon.

Analysis and Speculation

Open to all, The Blue Ribbon Project's workshops start with an introduction of the aims that a certain institution has commited to. The introduction is followed by urban analysis and speculative urban design activities, probing the feasibility of the aims and suggesting the set of actions required for their realisation, for a blue ribbon.

support

If you are interested in supporting The Blue Ribbon Project, get in touch. We will be following, shortly, with other ways to support it. Join A Real Space Community on lu.ma for updates.
